properties.title: CryoSat+ Mountain Glaciers
properties.description: Quantify the volume, mass change and contribution to sea level change of mountain glaciers using CryoSat satellite radar altimeter data
properties.osc:consortium: University of Edinburgh (UoE), isardSAT, Environmental Earth Observation Information Technology GMBH, earthwave Earth Observation and Data Science Specialists, University College of London ‚ Mullard Space Science Labor (UCL)
